description.value:
Can use Reaction to Nullify Opposing Psyker within Willpower Characteristic Metres. Before Opposing Psyker's Focus Power test, Character makes Focus Power Test (can choose strength), each Degree of Success imposes -10 to opposing psyker's test. Can cause Psychic Phenomena. Gives +5 to all Focus Power Tests.

Requirements

Does nothing if wearer is not a psyker

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
